== Karivellur (CT) (627209) ==

Karivellur (CT) is a town in the [[Taliparamba]] taluka of [[Kannur]] district with an area of 11.33 sq. km. and harbouring 3463 households with total population of 13498 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Kannur]] is at a distance of 50 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 545 km. Male population is 6252 and female population is 7246. Scheduled Caste population is 530 and Scheduled Tribes population is 12. Census Location Code of the town is 627209<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class IV (population_total 10,000 to 19,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Kanhangad  (m + og) at a distance of 30 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kozhikode (m corp. + og) at a distance of 120 km. Railway station is at North thrikkaripur at a distance of 8 km.
